title: Build acronym from string phrase - write code

content.question: Which of the following can be used to replace /* missing code */ so that the code segment works as intended?

choices.label: text += temp.substring(0, 1); temp = temp.substring(i + 1); i = temp.indexOf(" ");
temp = temp.substring(i + 1); text += temp.substring(0, 1); i = temp.indexOf(" ");

content.answer: temp = temp.substring(i + 1); text += temp.substring(0, 1); i = temp.indexOf(" ");

skill.text: 2.C: Write program code involving procedural abstractions.
